name: @larapida-websites/prisma
// targets: to see all targets run: nx show project @larapida-websites/prisma --web

development.command: dotenvx run -f .env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev

production.command: dotenvx run -f .env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy

options.command: dotenvx run -f tools/prisma/.env -- pnpm exec ts-node --transpile-only tools/prisma/seed/index.ts --project tools/prisma/seed/tsconfig.json
